detail_desc: Top in soft, ribbed jersey made from a cotton blend with a polo neck and long sleeves with frilled trims. Overlocked edges around the neck, cuffs and hem.
Short dress in soft jersey with a V-neck, wrapover front and long sleeves. Seam with a tie belt at the waist and a skirt with a flounce at the hem. Unlined.
Short dress in soft jersey with a V-neck, wrapover front and long sleeves. Seam with a tie belt at the waist and a skirt with a flounce at the hem. Unlined.

Socks in a cotton blend with ribbed, gathered shafts.
Short, fitted dress in jersey with narrow shoulder straps and a short slit at the front of the hem. Unlined.
Short, fitted dress in jersey with narrow shoulder straps and a short slit at the front of the hem. Unlined.
Short, straight-cut dress in ribbed jersey with short, flounce-trimmed sleeves, a seam and detachable tie belt at the waist and a flounce at the hem. Unlined.

Short. sleeveless dress in sturdy jersey with a V-neck at the front and concealed zip at the back. Fitted bodice and a bell-shaped skirt. Unlined.
Leather belt with a metal buckle. Width 3.5 cm.
Leather belt with a metal buckle. Width 3.5 cm.

Ankle-length jeans in washed, stretch cotton denim with a fake fly, fake front pockets and real back pockets. Wide, flared legs with raw-edge hems. Wide jersey ribbing at the waist for best fit over the tummy.

Ankle-length jeans in washed, stretch denim with fake front pockets, real back pockets and straight legs with raw edges and a small slit at the hems. Low jersey panel at the waist for best fit over the tummy.
Top in soft, printed sweatshirt fabric. Double-layered hood with a decorative drawstring and wrapover front, a kangaroo pocket and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Top in soft, printed sweatshirt fabric. Double-layered hood with a decorative drawstring and wrapover front, a kangaroo pocket and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Calf-length skirt in airy, patterned, crinkled chiffon. High waist with covered elastication, and a seam with an asymmetric flounce. Jersey underskirt.
Boots in imitation leather with a glittery finish. Elastic gores in the sides and a loop at the back. Fabric linings and insoles and fluted soles.

Padded bomber jacket in a nylon weave with a ribbed stand-up collar and zip down the front. Welt side pockets with a press-stud, a zipped sleeve pocket, an inner pocket with a press-stud, and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Lined.

Padded bomber jacket in a nylon weave with a ribbed stand-up collar and zip down the front. Welt side pockets with a press-stud, a zipped sleeve pocket, an inner pocket with a press-stud, and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Lined.

Coat in woven fabric made from a felted wool blend with a stand-up collar and buttons down the front. Diagonal, welt front pockets, two inner pockets, decorative buttons at the cuffs and a single back vent. Lined.

Short, straight-cut dress in woven fabric with a small stand-up collar, button placket, gathers at the shoulders and a gathered yoke at the back. Long balloon sleeves with buttoned cuffs. Unlined.

Bandeau bra in glittery jersey with a concealed silicone trim at the top, mesh-lined cups with removable inserts that shape the bust and provide good support, and a hook-and-eye fastening at the back.

Short dress in airy, jacquard-weave viscose with inset lace sections and pin-tucks. Flounces at the top and an opening and concealed button at the back of the neck. 3/4-length balloon sleeves with pin-tucks and narrow cuffs, and a smocked seam at the waist. Lined skirt.
Alice band covered in glossy jersey with a decorative knot detail at the top.
Earrings in hammered metal with large, pearly plastic beads. Length 5 cm and 9 cm.
Pleated top in soft jersey with a textured stripe and sheen. Straight-cut at the top in a wide, softly draping fit with wide shoulder straps.
Jumper in a soft, textured knit containing some wool with long sleeves, and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Jumper in a soft, fine knit with a round neck, an opening with a button at the back of the neck and long puff sleeves with wide ribbing at the cuffs.
Jumper in a soft knit with a fluffy finish. V-neck with an asymmetric edge, long sleeves, and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
Jumper in a soft lace knit with dropped shoulders, long sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Jumper in a soft lace knit with dropped shoulders, long sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Cardigan in a soft, lace knit with a round neck and buttons down the front. Gently dropped shoulders, long sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Cardigan in a soft, lace knit with a round neck and buttons down the front. Gently dropped shoulders, long sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Cardigan in a soft, lace knit with a round neck and buttons down the front. Gently dropped shoulders, long sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.

Shirt in an airy, patterned viscose and cotton weave with a turn-down collar and French front and yoke at the back. Long sleeves with adjustable buttoning at the cuffs, and a rounded hem. Slim Fit – a fit with narrow shoulders and a tapered waist for a fitted silhouette.

Set with a fleece-lined hat and pair of fleece-lined mittens in soft faux fur. Hat with ears on top and a hook and a loop fastening under the chin. Mittens with elastication at the cuffs. Size 6M without thumbs.

Set with a fleece-lined hat and pair of fleece-lined mittens in soft faux fur. Hat with ears on top and a hook and a loop fastening under the chin. Mittens with elastication at the cuffs. Size 6M without thumbs.
Jumper in a soft knit with a high collar, raglan sleeves and knitted frills around the collar and cuffs.
Short dress in crinkled jersey with a slight sheen. Deep V-neck, a wrapover front with a wide belt and a round, plastic buckle at one side.
Maxi dress in a crinkled weave with a sheen. V-neck and narrow, double shoulder straps that cross at the back. Elasticated seam under the bust and slits in the sides. Half-lined.
Maxi dress in a crinkled weave with a sheen. V-neck and narrow, double shoulder straps that cross at the back. Elasticated seam under the bust and slits in the sides. Half-lined.
Cardigan in a soft rib knit containing some wool with dropped shoulders, long sleeves. hole-knit sections and a detachable tie belt at the waist.
Cardigan in a soft rib knit containing some wool with dropped shoulders, long sleeves. hole-knit sections and a detachable tie belt at the waist.
Calf-length dress in a crêped rib knit with a V-neck and rounded spaghetti shoulder straps. Seam at the waist and a raw roll-edge hem. Skirt with a jersey lining.
Fitted vest top in stretch cotton jersey.
Fitted vest top in stretch cotton jersey.
Oversized jumper in a soft jacquard knit containing some alpaca wool with a round neckline and long raglan sleeves. Ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem. Slightly longer at the back.
Vest tops in soft, printed cotton jersey with a concealed press-stud on one shoulder.
Jumper in a soft, fluffy knit with decorative sequins.
Jumper in a soft, fluffy knit with decorative sequins.
Coat in sturdy twill made from a viscose blend. Stand-up collar with concealed press-studs and a concealed zip down the front, welt side pockets, two inner pockets, and a zip at the cuffs. Lined.
Coat in sturdy twill made from a viscose blend. Stand-up collar with concealed press-studs and a concealed zip down the front, welt side pockets, two inner pockets, and a zip at the cuffs. Lined.
Coat in sturdy twill made from a viscose blend. Stand-up collar with concealed press-studs and a concealed zip down the front, welt side pockets, two inner pockets, and a zip at the cuffs. Lined.

Rigid clutch bag in marbled plastic with a decorative knob on the top and a magnetic fastener. Narrow, adjustable metal chain shoulder strap. Grosgrain lining with elastication along the short sides. Size 4.5x10x18 cm.
Short dress in airy, spotted mesh with short, flounce-trimmed sleeves, a frill-trimmed yoke and seam with a flounce at the hem. Jersey underdress.

Stylish coat woven in a wool blend with narrow notch lapels and a decorative buttonhole. Fastening with three buttons at the front, a chest pocket, diagonal welt pockets at the sides and two inner pockets, one at each side. Decorative buttons at the cuffs and a single back vent. Lined. The wool content of the coat and the polyester content of the lining are recycled.

Fastening with three buttons at the front, a chest pocket, diagonal welt pockets at the sides and two inner pockets, one at each side. Decorative buttons at the cuffs and a single back vent. Lined. Short faux fur jacket with concealed hook-and-eye fasteners at the front and side pockets. Satin lining.

Short duffle coat in soft, felted fabric with toggle fastenings at the front and a lined hood with a detachable faux fur trim. One inner pocket with a press-stud, and large patch front pockets. Lined.

Double-breasted pea coat in a felted wool blend with a detachable collar in soft faux fur and narrow notch lapels. Jetted handwarmer pockets at the top, flap front pockets and two inner pockets. Tab with adjustable buttoning at the cuffs. Lined. The wool content of the coat and the polyester content of the lining are recycled.
Calf-length dress in jersey crêpe with a V-neck, narrow adjustable shoulder straps and a draped wrapover front with ties at one side.
Short, A-line dress in jersey crêpe with gathers and a small frill trim at the top and tie-top shoulder straps. Seam below the bust and at the hem with wide, tiered flounces.

Fitted, calf-length dress in jersey crêpe with a V-neck, narrow adjustable shoulder straps, a draped, sewn-in wrapover front and decorative ties at one side. Unlined.
